titleStmt.title: Lazarus redivivus, or, A discovery of the trials and triumphs that accompany the vvork of God in and about his people with an essay, tending to clear up those mistakes men have about it : laid open in several sermons.
titleStmt.author: Blakie, N.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded and tightly bound with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Glasgow University Library.
